metadata.purpose: Bidirectional mapping: entities ↔ verification claims for confidence scoring

verification_claims.claim_text: Jeffrey Epstein was born in 1953
verification_claims.section: I. Verification of Foundational Timelines and Biographies

verification_claims.claim_text: Epstein graduated from Lafayette High School in 1969, at age 16, having skipped two grades
verification_claims.section: I. Verification of Foundational Timelines and Biographies

verification_claims.claim_text: Epstein attended Cooper Union from 1969 to 1971
verification_claims.section: I. Verification of Foundational Timelines and Biographies

verification_claims.claim_text: Epstein transferred to Courant Institute at NYU 1971-1974 but did not complete degree
verification_claims.section: I. Verification of Foundational Timelines and Biographies

verification_claims.claim_text: Despite lack of college degree, Epstein taught physics and mathematics at Dalton School 1974-1976
verification_claims.section: I. Verification of Foundational Timelines and Biographies

verification_claims.claim_text: Epstein sexually abused minors while a teacher at Dalton
verification_claims.section: I. Verification of Foundational Timelines and Biographies

verification_claims.claim_text: Epstein was hired by Bear Stearns in 1976
verification_claims.section: I. Verification of Foundational Timelines and Biographies

verification_claims.claim_text: Epstein was brought on by CEO Alan 'Ace' Greenberg after tutoring Greenberg's son
verification_claims.section: I. Verification of Foundational Timelines and Biographies

verification_claims.claim_text: Epstein's tenure at Bear Stearns lasted until 1981
verification_claims.section: I. Verification of Foundational Timelines and Biographies

verification_claims.claim_text: Epstein left Bear Stearns due to mysterious circumstances surrounding insider trading issue
verification_claims.section: I. Verification of Foundational Timelines and Biographies

verification_claims.claim_text: Epstein was a Member of the Trilateral Commission and CFR
verification_claims.section: I. Verification of Foundational Timelines and Biographies

verification_claims.claim_text: Maxwell moved to New York City in 1992 following death of father in November 1991 and subsequently met Epstein
verification_claims.section: I. Verification of Foundational Timelines and Biographies

verification_claims.claim_text: The TerraMar Project announced closure on July 12, 2019, shortly after Epstein's arrest by NY federal prosecutors
verification_claims.section: I. Verification of Foundational Timelines and Biographies

verification_claims.claim_text: Leslie H. 'Les' Wexner was close friend & mentor to Epstein who managed Wexner's money
verification_claims.section: I. Verification of Foundational Timelines and Biographies

verification_claims.claim_text: In 1991, Wexner made Epstein trustee of Ohio Higher Education Trust ($230M philanthropic fund), Wexner Foundation, and Wexner Heritage Foundation
verification_claims.section: I. Verification of Foundational Timelines and Biographies

verification_claims.claim_text: Epstein and Wexner met at Bear Stearns where Epstein worked 1976-1981
verification_claims.section: I. Verification of Foundational Timelines and Biographies

verification_claims.claim_text: Brunel established MC2 Model Management in 2005 with $1 million line of credit from Epstein
verification_claims.section: I. Verification of Foundational Timelines and Biographies

verification_claims.claim_text: After leaving Bear Stearns, Epstein started International Assets Group Inc. (I.A.G.) out of his apartment in 1982
verification_claims.section: II. Analysis of Core Financial and Corporate Structures

verification_claims.claim_text: In 1982, Michael Stroll filed lawsuit against Epstein. Case is Stroll v. Epstein, 818 F. Supp. 640 (S.D.N.Y. 1993)
verification_claims.section: II. Analysis of Core Financial and Corporate Structures

verification_claims.claim_text: Stroll lost the suit against Epstein personally
verification_claims.section: II. Analysis of Core Financial and Corporate Structures

verification_claims.claim_text: I.A.G. received $450,000 investment from Stroll which Epstein put into oil. Epstein claimed money was for a horse he'd bought from Stroll
verification_claims.section: II. Analysis of Core Financial and Corporate Structures

verification_claims.claim_text: In early 80's Epstein met Steven Hoffenberg. In 1987 Hoffenberg and Epstein partnered up
verification_claims.section: II. Analysis of Core Financial and Corporate Structures

verification_claims.claim_text: Epstein was Hoffenberg's 'uncharged co-conspirator' and 'architect of the scam'. Millions stolen served as 'seed capital' for Epstein's hedge fund
verification_claims.section: II. Analysis of Core Financial and Corporate Structures

verification_claims.claim_text: In 1993 Epstein bought Zorro Ranch in New Mexico from Bruce King with Zorro Development Corp
verification_claims.section: II. Analysis of Core Financial and Corporate Structures

verification_claims.claim_text: In 2008, Epstein's company Zorro Trust won over $29 million in Oklahoma state lottery
verification_claims.section: II. Analysis of Core Financial and Corporate Structures

verification_claims.claim_text: In 2004 Epstein d/b/a Financial Trust Co of St. Thomas, VI, sues Citibank
verification_claims.section: II. Analysis of Core Financial and Corporate Structures

verification_claims.claim_text: In March 2005 Palm Beach Police first start investigating Epstein based on call from upset parent
verification_claims.section: III. The Florida Criminal Case: 2005-2008

verification_claims.claim_text: In 2006, PB police alerted FBI who began to investigate Epstein
verification_claims.section: III. The Florida Criminal Case: 2005-2008

verification_claims.claim_text: Epstein enters guilty plea for one count 'procuring a minor for prostitution' and 'soliciting prostitution'
verification_claims.section: III. The Florida Criminal Case: 2005-2008

verification_claims.claim_text: Epstein served 13 months of 18-month state sentence in vacant wing at Palm Beach County Stockade with work release 8am-8pm 6 days/week
verification_claims.section: III. The Florida Criminal Case: 2005-2008

verification_claims.claim_text: NPA guarantees federal government will not prosecute Epstein
verification_claims.section: IV. Deconstruction of the 2007 Federal Non-Prosecution Agreement (NPA)

verification_claims.claim_text: NPA grants immunity to all Epstein's alleged co-conspirators
verification_claims.section: IV. Deconstruction of the 2007 Federal Non-Prosecution Agreement (NPA)

verification_claims.claim_text: NPA requires Epstein consent to allow victims to seek damages. Epstein must offer to pay plaintiff's attorney fees but must be allowed to choose which attorneys plaintiffs use. Plaintiffs allowed to use non-Epstein lawyers but then must cover cost themselves
verification_claims.section: IV. Deconstruction of the 2007 Federal Non-Prosecution Agreement (NPA)

verification_claims.claim_text: Bruce E. Reinhart was Asst US District Attorney before leaving government to defend Epstein. He represented Sarah Kellen at time of her 2010 deposition
verification_claims.section: IV. Deconstruction of the 2007 Federal Non-Prosecution Agreement (NPA)

verification_claims.claim_text: L.M. aka Jane Doe #1 hires Edwards to represent her in federal suit claiming her rights as victim violated by terms of Epstein's NPA. Case is ongoing
verification_claims.section: V. A Compendium of Verified Civil Litigation and Testimonial Evidence

verification_claims.claim_text: Sarah Kellen, Nadia Marcinkova, and Jeffrey Epstein invoked Fifth Amendment when asked about trafficking girls
verification_claims.section: V. A Compendium of Verified Civil Litigation and Testimonial Evidence

verification_claims.claim_text: On March 8 and 9 2010 Epstein was deposed for lawsuit he filed against Bradley J. Edwards and Scott Rothstein
verification_claims.section: V. A Compendium of Verified Civil Litigation and Testimonial Evidence

verification_claims.claim_text: Epstein met Clinton as early as 1995 when he paid tens of thousands to join him at intimate fund-raising dinner in Palm Beach
verification_claims.section: VI. Verification of Prominent Associations

verification_claims.claim_text: Epstein and Clinton first met in 1993 at White House donors' reception
verification_claims.section: VI. Verification of Prominent Associations

verification_claims.claim_text: Epstein traveled in 2001 with Prince Andrew to Thailand
verification_claims.section: VI. Verification of Prominent Associations

verification_claims.claim_text: In 2004 Epstein bid on residential estate at 513 N. Country Road in Palm Beach but was outbid by Donald Trump
verification_claims.section: VI. Verification of Prominent Associations
